title: Land for Sale Thalawathugoda, Pelawatta. URGENT SALE
details:
A fantastic 11.25 Perch elevated land with calm and quiet environment in Jothikarama Rd, Thalawathugoda.
4 minutes from Thalawatugoda Junction, 8 mins from Pelawatta junction
Good residential neighborhood. Clear deeds.
Private Paved lane.
Ideal to construct a luxury house.
